mapper.select: SELECT FROM boot_sys_menu a ,boot_sys_role b ,boot_sys_role_menu c ,boot_sys_user_role e WHERE a.id = c.menu_id AND c.role_id = b.id AND b.id = e.role_id AND e.user_id = #{userId} AND a.del_flag = 0 AND a.type = 0 AND a.visible = 0 GROUP BY ORDER BY a.sort desc
SELECT a.id FROM boot_sys_menu a ,boot_sys_role b ,boot_sys_role_menu c WHERE a.id = c.menu_id AND c.role_id = b.id AND b.id = #{roleId} and a.del_flag = 0 group by a.id

select id ,pid ,`name` from boot_sys_menu where del_flag = 0 AND `name` <> '修改菜单' AND `name` <> '新增菜单' AND `name` <> '删除菜单' AND `name` not LIKE '%租户%' and `name` not like '%索引%' AND `name` not LIKE '%套餐%' AND `name` not LIKE '%数据源%' AND `name` not like '%事务%' AND `name` not like '%配置%' and `name` not like '%文档%' and `name` not like '%监控%' and `name` not like '%IP%' and `name` not like '%调度%' and `name` not like '%集群%' order by sort desc

select a.id ,a.pid ,a.`name` ,a.icon ,a.url ,a.`type` ,a.permission ,a.visible ,a.sort from boot_sys_menu a join boot_sys_package_menu b on b.menu_id = a.id where a.del_flag = 0 and b.package_id = #{packageId}
select version from boot_sys_menu where id = #{id}
